text:
Hi there! :slightly_smiling_face:
I and a couple of friends who work producing HS modules from long time decided to try to sell some assets in the HS Marketplace so we created a free account and we want start from there. We get stuck when it comes to approval for the account: what action should we take to get the account approved? Anyone’s experienced that before?
It’s telling you to go to your profile, did you do that?

Hi Jon, thx for the fast feedback.
Sure, I did it. Unfortunately the link returns a blank page:
And when it comes to Company info section, it seems that the account is in review period. I wonder if we need to submit any further data there, to have the account validated :slightly_smiling_face:
I haven’t personally seen this before, I’m asking around internally.
Try filling in your company and contact info. (The items you _are_ able to edit)
Actually not able to save those info neither.
huh. I’ll get back to you. We’ll continue this thread over DM.
Sure: feel free to reach me back
